name: Mobs 'N Monsters
storyline:
Doctor Malice has opened her castle gates to all monsters- scaley, slimey, or fur-faced. They’re welcome to stay indefinitely... so long as they can pay rent. Otherwise, they can volunteer for an experiment here or there as payment. But life in Shiverfall Peaks isn’t as peaceful as the monsters hoped. Local villagers, now aware of the outcasts’ refuge, do what they do best- form an angry mob! Will you let them run your monstrous family out with torches and pitchforks, or will you fight for your place in this wicked world?

Recruit a plethora of classic monsters to aid in battle. Zombies, Witches, and Goblins, OH MY!

Slingshot physics-based destruction to village structures. Fling everything from Toads to Pumpkin Heads to, yes, even your monster residents for devilish damage and gruesome status effects.

Spend gold to repair and upgrade your castle defenses between battles. Build an impenetrable fortress of fear that no villager dare enter.

Customize the looks and names of your monsters. Upgrade and equip them with powerful gear. Be careful about getting too attached to your residents, however. Even in a castle full of the undead, permadeath is a killer!
summary: Manage a spooky castle of monsters & fend off angry mobs with Slingshot action in this Physics-based Tower-Defense RTS. Fling vampires, mummies, & more to make the local villages crumble. Upgrade your units & castle between battles for impenetrable defenses & cause monstrous destruction!
